column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: :------ An Indian tuk-tuk driver picked up a strange customer at 8:30 pm (*day not clear) near Wat Phnom.------Arriving near Wat Phnom at the Daun Penh statue
column4: the tuk tuk driver saw a large python across his path. He stopped the ride to make sure the snake was not hit by traffic and the python climbed into his tuk-tuk.------The serpent stopped under the steering wheel and went quiet.------The frightened driver asked for help from passers by to retrieve the python
column5: but the snake refused to budge for at least for an hour. After being removed
column6: it was then released into Wat Phnom. ------KBN
